column4: Hey I have a question, I have a Kubuntu CD  I am running Ubunty but I would like to install KDE as well, is there a way I can do it without having to download KDE fromt he repository?
just insert the kubuntu cd, and try 'sudo apt-get install kubuntu-desktop'. it will see the cd and scan there first
did it fop me, but i use all alternate cds
